title: Robert M. and Elaine J. Collins Endowment in Nephrology
description: To provide support for senior Nephrology faculty, an annual lectureship on kidney disease and meritorious programs in kidney disease research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
marketingContent: To augment funds to provide a Chair in Nephrology; to provide annual lectureship on kidney disease; to provide meritorious programs in kidney disease research at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.
